title: Optimized Sleep Headphones Features
intro: This list represents an analysis of sleep headphones features from 11 companies. A total of 4 features were gathered and optimized for relevance and informativeness.

Audio.title: Audio
features: Thin, padded removable speakers for various audio (1)

Versatility.title: Versatility
features: Corded and wireless versions for different preferences (1)

Customization.title: Customization
features: Wide variety of colors and fabrics for personalization (1)
